name: Aeon-MLTB
description: A streamlined and feature-rich bot designed for efficient deployment and enhanced functionality.

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: List of authorized chat IDs, separated by space or newline.

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB connection string for database storage.

SUDO_USERS.description: List of sudo user IDs, separated by space. Leave empty if not needed.

TELEGRAM_API.description: Your Telegram API ID from https://my.telegram.org.

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from https://my.telegram.org.

UPSTREAM_BRANCH.description: The branch name of the upstream repository to pull updates from.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: The URL of the upstream repository to pull updates from.
